ygData.subject: Re: The plane of fear
ygData.msgSnippet: My one tip to you: if you see more than one thing coming in on a pull, TURN OFF ALL SONGS!!!  And don t resume singing until the enchanters get all extras
ygData.messageBody:
My one tip to you: if you see more than one thing coming in on a pull, TURN
OFF ALL SONGS!!! And don't resume singing until the enchanters get all
extras mez'd. Unless you just really like unecessary deaths.

Knaeve--Quel

Amusing side story: was clearing to Cazic in fear a couple weekends ago.
Pulled the golems, which means Cazic began DTing people. Killed the golem,
everyone sat to camp. Teeth, a fellow bard, shouts "I'll bet 100pp that the
next DT goes to a bard!"

Cazic Thule says, "TEETH!"
Teeth has been slain by Cazic Thule!
